column5: got out both day's friday we had our limit 18 by 12:30 on sat we had our limit 18 by 10:30. i got my order in of 6oz bottom bouncers they worked awesome dispy's at 120 jet's at 140  and leadcore 7 color's all on spinners. big fish both day's was 28in.
Outstanding couple days for sure Doug, and it would seem you've been having a great season so far.
Congrats to you Doug. Erie will be crawling with people now.
th   thank's lew fishing is hot right now

Hammering them all along the north shore right now. We also limited out by 11:00 AM. Hitting at 45 feet just below the thermocline in 80 feet. Copper dipsys set at 3 on wire. Spoons and meat on a harness.  Didn't decide to go out until midnight. On the water at 6:00 AM. Good decision to go.

Glad you guys caught.   Was out Friday for 12 hours and every boat that came in at Lowbanks Nada   , Perch weren't even hitting. Going back tomorrow for a couple days.. Lots of boats out, thought to myself, doesn't anyone work anymore. Must be all old retires. Dam East wind!
